entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear early this morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 10 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MDT Sunday 26 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Flurries beginning this evening. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MDT Sunday 26 March 2023
